      • showValuesFerreterias

        public static void showValuesFerreterias(java.lang.String location,
                                         int numMaterials,
                                         int[] priceHomecenter,
                                         int[] amountMaterials,
                                         int[] priceFerreteriaBarrio,
                                         int[] priceFerreteriaCentro)
        Method to show the values in each hardware store. pre: must be initialized the methods called like as "totalPriceWorkHomecenter", "totalPriceWorkFerreteriaCentro",
        "totalPriceWorkFerreteriaBarrio" in the operations class.
        post: Showing the value to be to paid in each hardware store.
        Parameters:
        location - ask for the location. location != "" and (location = Norte || location = Sur || location = Centro).
        numMaterials - numbers of the products to buy. numMaterials != "" and numMaterials = greater than 0.
        priceHomecenter - cost of the product on Homecenter. priceHomecenter != priceHomecenter lesser than 0.
        amountMaterials - amount of the number of the products. amountMaterials != amountMaterials lesser than 0.
        priceFerreteriaBarrio - cost of the product on Ferreteria centro. priceFerreteriaBarrio != priceFerreteriaBarrio lesser than 0.
        priceFerreteriaCentro - cost of the product on Ferreteria centro. priceFerreteriaCentro != priceFerreteriaCentro lesser than 0.

      • showBestProduct

        public static void showBestProduct(int numMaterials,
                                   int[] priceFerreteriaBarrio,
                                   int[] priceFerreteriaCentro,
                                   int[] priceHomecenter,
                                   int[] amountMaterials,
                                   int[] bestPrice,
                                   java.lang.String[] nameMaterials,
                                   java.lang.String location)
        Method to show the best price and the best place to buy each material and also the best price to pay. pre: must be initialized the methods called like as "metBestPlace", "metBestPrice" and "bestPay" in the operations class .
        post: Showing the best place and price for each material.
        Parameters:
        numMaterials - numbers of the products to buy. numMaterials != "" and numMaterials = greater than 0.
        priceHomecenter - cost of the product on Homecenter. priceHomecenter != priceHomecenter lesser than 0.
        priceFerreteriaBarrio - cost of the product on Ferreteria centro. priceFerreteriaBarrio != priceFerreteriaBarrio lesser than 0.
        priceFerreteriaCentro - cost of the product on Ferreteria centro. priceFerreteriaCentro != priceFerreteriaCentro lesser than 0.
        amountMaterials - amount of the number of the products. amountMaterials != amountMaterials lesser than 0.
        bestPrice - the best price for each material. bestPrice != "" and bestPrice != null.
        nameMaterials - name of the product for the work. nameMaterials != null || nameMaterials != "".
        location - ask for the location. location != "" and (location = Norte || location = Sur || location = Centro).

      • showUtilization

        public static void showUtilization(int numMaterials,
                                   java.lang.String[] utilMaterials,
                                   java.lang.String[] nameMaterials)
        Method of displaying materials according to their use. pre: must be initialized the methods called like as "utilizationProductBlackWork", "utilizationProductWhiteWork"
        and "bestPay" in the operations class.
        post: Showing the material according to its use.
        Parameters:
        numMaterials - numbers of the products to buy. numMaterials != "" and numMaterials = greater than 0.
        utilMaterials - use of the product. utilMaterials != "" and (utilMaterials = Obra negra || utilMaterials = Obra blanca || utilMaterials = Pintura).
        nameMaterials - name of the product for the work. nameMaterials != null || nameMaterials != "".

      • showMenu

        public static void showMenu(java.util.Scanner sc,
                            int numMaterials,
                            int[] priceFerreteriaBarrio,
                            int[] priceFerreteriaCentro,
                            int[] priceHomecenter,
                            int[] amountMaterials,
                            java.lang.String location,
                            java.lang.String[] nameMaterials,
                            java.lang.String[] utilMaterials,
                            int[] bestPrice)
        Method to show a menu in which the user can choose the action to be executed. pre: all methods in the Main class must be initialized.
        post: show the method chosen by the user.
        Parameters:
        sc - ask for the chosen option. sc = 1 || sc = 2 || sc = 3 || sc = 4
        numMaterials - numbers of the products to buy. numMaterials != "" and numMaterials = greater than 0.
        priceHomecenter - cost of the product on Homecenter. priceHomecenter != priceHomecenter lesser than 0.
        priceFerreteriaBarrio - cost of the product on Ferreteria centro. priceFerreteriaBarrio != priceFerreteriaBarrio lesser than 0.
        priceFerreteriaCentro - cost of the product on Ferreteria centro. priceFerreteriaCentro != priceFerreteriaCentro lesser than 0.
        amountMaterials - amount of the number of the products. amountMaterials != amountMaterials lesser than 0.
        location - ask for the location. location != "" and (location = Norte || location = Sur || location = Centro).
        utilMaterials - use of the product. utilMaterials != "" and (utilMaterials = Obra negra || utilMaterials = Obra blanca || utilMaterials = Pintura).
        nameMaterials - name of the product for the work. nameMaterials != null || nameMaterials != "".
        bestPrice - the best price for each material. bestPrice != "" and bestPrice != null.
